name: Elderflower Cordial Herbal Tea Blend
summary: It’s the season for thirst-quenching patio drinks; and Elderflower Cordial cocktails and zero-proof drinks are on the menu! Floral, fruity, and sweet, this tea is bursting with flavour. Go beyond your standard hot and cold drinks—get creative with Elderflower cordial, spritzers, tea sangria, and ice pops!
